description.en:
SmartCoin is a Paladin-audited yield farming protocol on Avalanche (AVAX) with an innovative self-feeding tokenomics system and a 100% fair launch.
Our primary goal is to provide a safe, stable and profitable experience for those who enjoy the thrill of hunting for high APRs, while distributing a perpetually increasing amount of SmartCoin per day to the community in the form of massive booster mechanics and economic stimulus incentives.
